title: Textile, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: wool on cotton
Technique: crewel embroidery on twill weave
dimensions:
Other (band): 100 cm (39 3/8 in.)
Other (top to bottom): 22 cm (8 11/16 in.)
description: Border from the bottom of a skirt, of heavy twill weave cotton, embroidered in polychrome wool. A formal arrangement of stylized enframements, with foliage flower clusters, and lattice-like forms between. Worked in chain stitch, knots etc. Skilful shading of blues, reds and greens in larger areas. Material is 17 1/2 " wide and three selvages present, on reverse; band is 1m long and 22cm top to bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 18th century.
early 18th century. Medium: wool on cotton
Technique: crewel embroidery on twill weave. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1954-167-3.
